segments.text: Amidst the mundane task of dish drying, the woman stands like a sentinel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet there’s so much more happening just a few feet away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s risky climb has me feeling anxious; he could slip at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m dumbfounded that he has the audacity to go for the cookies right in front of her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the girl’s eager stance, her hope fixed on the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocence is charming, but it’s also tinged with the threat of a mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish that in this beautiful domestic scene, someone would take notice.
segments.speaker: PAR
